title: Quarkus Base Runtime Image
summary: The guide provides details on using Quarkus base Docker images for containerized native executables. It particularly highlights the use of 'quarkus-micro-image:2.0', a small and container-optimized image, and provides instructions for basic usage, extending the image with extra libraries, and alternative options using 'ubi-minimal' images for users needing a full Linux distribution with more utilities.
